00038 void RenderBrokenLink()
00039 {
00040       //Color fill the laptop white
00041       DrawBrokenLinkWhiteBackground();
00042 
00043       SetFontShadow( NO_SHADOW );
00044 
00045       //Put up a message saying the link is dead
00046       DisplayWrappedString(BROKEN_LINK__MESSAGE_X, BROKEN_LINK__MESSAGE_Y, BROKEN_LINK__MESSAGE_WIDTH, 2, BROKEN_LINK__FONT, BROKEN_LINK__COLOR, BrokenLinkText[ BROKEN_LINK_TXT_ERROR_404 ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00047 
00048       //Put up a message saying the link is dead
00049       DisplayWrappedString(BROKEN_LINK__MESSAGE_X, BROKEN_LINK__SITE_NOT_FOUND_Y, BROKEN_LINK__MESSAGE_WIDTH, 2, BROKEN_LINK__FONT, BROKEN_LINK__COLOR, BrokenLinkText[ BROKEN_LINK_TXT_SITE_NOT_FOUND ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00050 
00051       SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
00052 
00053       InvalidateRegion(0,0,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
00054 }
00055 
00056 
00057 void DrawBrokenLinkWhiteBackground()
00058 {
00059       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y, LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB(  255,   255,   255) ) );
00060 }
